original_text: The people who remain in Judah will be like strong plants that put their roots down into the ground. Their branches will give lots of fruit. 37: The people who remain in Judah will be like strong plants that put their roots down into the ground. Their branches will give lots of fruit. 37: The people who remain in Judah will be like strong plants that put their roots down into the ground. Their branches will give lots of fruit.
korean_text: 유다 족속 중에 피하여 남은 자는 다시 아래로 뿌리를 박고 위로 열매를 맺으리니

sentences.original_text: The people who remain in Judah
that put their roots down into the ground
Their branches will give lots of fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 가지들은 많은 열매를 맺을 것이다
